pkgmetadata.longdescription: # `mujoco_utils`[![PyPI Python Version][pypi-versions-badge]][pypi][![PyPI version][pypi-badge]][pypi][![build][tests-badge]][tests][pypi-versions-badge]: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/mujoco_utils[pypi-badge]: https://badge.fury.io/py/mujoco_utils.svg[pypi]: https://pypi.org/project/mujoco_utils/[tests-badge]: https://github.com/kevinzakka/mujoco_utils/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg[tests]: https://github.com/kevinzakka/mujoco_utils/actions/workflows/ci.ymlUtilities for working with [MuJoCo Python bindings](https://github.com/deepmind/mujoco/blob/main/python/README.md) and [dm_control](https://github.com/deepmind/dm_control).
